maqras.text: 16|51|Ara allah‌ balechena, ‘tomara du'i ilah grahana karo na [1]; tini'i to ekamatra ilah [2]. Kaje'i tomara sudhu amake'i bhaya kara.’
16|52|Ara asamanasamuhe o yamine ya kichu ache ta tamra'i ebam sarbaksanika anugatya tamra'i prapya [1]. Tarapara'o ki tomara allah‌ chara an'ya kara'o taka'oya abalambana karabe
16|53|ara tomadera kache ye saba niyamata rayeche ta to allah‌ra'i kacha theke; tarapara yakhana duhkha-dain'ya tomaderake sparsa kare takhana tomara tamke'i byakulabhabe daka [1].
16|54|Tarapara yakhana allah‌ tomadera duhkha-dain'ya duribhuta karena takhana tomadera ekadala tadera rabera sathe sirka kare [1]
16|55|amara taderake ya diyechi ta asbikara karara jan'ya. Kaje'i tomara bhoga kare na'o, acire'i tomara janate parabe.

16|56|Ara amara taderake ye riyaka dana kari tara tara eka ansa nirdharana kare [1] tadera jan'ya yadera sambandhe tara kichu'i jane na [2]. Sapatha allah‌ra! Tomara ya mithya udbhabana kara se samparke abasya'i tomaderake prasna kara habe.
16|57|Ara tara nirdharana kare allah‌ra jan'ya [1] kan'ya santana [2]--- tini pabitra, mahimanbita. Ara tadera jan'ya ta'i ya tara kamana kare [3]
16|58|tadera ka'uke yakhana kan'ya santanera susambada deya haya takhana tara mukhamandala kalo haye yaya ebam se asahaniya manasika yantranaya klista haya [1].

16|59|Take ye susambada deya haya, tara glanira karane se nija sampradaya hate atmagopana kare. Se cinta kare hinata satbe'o ki take rekhe debe, naki matite pumte phelabe [1]. Sabadhana! Tara ya sid'dhanta kare ta kata nikrsta
16|60|Yara akherate imana rakhe na yabatiya kharapa udaharana (dosasamuha) tadera'i, ara allah‌ra jan'ya'i yabatiya mahottama gunabali [1] ara tini'i parakramasali, prajnamaya [2].

16|61|Ara allah‌ yadi manusake tadera simalanghanera jan'ya sasti ditena tabe bhuprsthe kono jiba- jantuke'i reha'i ditena na [1]; kintu tini eka nirdista kala paryanta taderake abakasa diye thakena. Atahpara yakhana tadera samaya ase takhana tara mahurtakala agate ba pichate pare na.

16|62|Ara ya tara apachanda kare ta-i tara allah‌ra prati aropa kare. Tadera jihba mithya barnana kare ye, mangala to tadera'i jan'ya [1]. Nihsandehe tadera jan'ya ache aguna, ara niscaya taderake'i sabara age tate niksepa kara habe [2].

16|63|Sapatha allah‌ra! Amara apanara age'o bahu jatira kache rasula pathiyechi; kintu sayatana aisaba jatira karyakalapa tadera drstite sobhana karechila; kaje'i se –i aja [1] tadera abhibhakaka ara tadera'i jan'ya rayeche yantranadayaka sasti.

16|64|Ara amara to apanara prati kitaba nayila karechi yara e bisaye matabheda kare taderake suspastabhabe bujhiye deyara jan'ya ebam yara imana ane emana sampradayera jan'ya pathanirdesa o dayasbarupa [1].
16|65|Ara allah‌ akasa hate bari barsana karena ebam ta diye tini bhumike tara mrtyura para punarjibita karena. Niscaya ete nidarsana rayeche emana sampradayera jan'ya yara katha sone [1].
16|66|Ara niscaya gabadi pasura madhye tomadera jan'ya siksa rayeche. Tara petera gobara o raktera madhya theke [1] tomaderake pana kara'i bisud'dha dudha, ya panakaridera jan'ya sbacchandyakara.
16|67|Ara khejura gachera phala o angura hate tomara madaka o uttama khadya grahana kare thaka [1]; niscaya ete bodhasakti sampanna sampradayera jan'ya rayeche nidarsana [2].
16|68|Ara apanara raba maumachike tara antare ingita dbara nirdesa diyechena [1], ‘ghara tairi kara pahare, gache o manusa ye macana tairi kare tate

16|69|‘erapara pratyeka phala hate kichu kichu kha'o, atahpara tomara rabera sahaja patha anusarana kara [1]’. Tara peta theke nirgata haya bibhinna rana era paniya [2]; yate manusera jan'ya rayeche arogya [3]. Niscaya ete rayeche cintasila sampradayera jan'ya nidarsana [4].

16|70|Ara allah‌i tomaderake srsti karechena; tarapara tini tomadera mrtyu ghatabena ebam tomadera madhye ka'uke pratyabartita [1] kara habe nikrstatama bayase [2]; yate jnana labhera pare'o tara sabakichu ajana haye yaya. Niscaya allah‌ sarbajna, purna ksamatabana [3].

16|71|Ara allah‌ jibanopakarane tomadera madhye ka'uke karo upara sresthatba diyechena. Yaderake sresthatba deya hayeche tara tadera adhinastha dasadasiderake nijedera jibanopakarana hate emana kichu deya na yate tara e bisaye tadera samana haye yaya [1]. Tabe ki tara allah‌ra anugraha asbikara karache [2]

16|72|ara allah‌ tomadera theke'i tomadera jora srsti karechena [1] ebam tomadera yugala theke tomadera jan'ya putra-pautradi srsti karechena [2] ebam tomaderake uttama jibanopakarana dana karechena [3]. Tabu'o ki tara batilera sbikrti debe [4] ara tara allah‌ra anugraha asbikara karabe [5]
16|73|ara tara ibadata kare allah‌ chara emana kichura, yegulo asamana o yamina hate tadera kono jibanopakaranera malika naya ebam hate'o saksama naya [1].
16|74|Kaje'i tomara allah‌ra kona sadrsa sthira karo na [1]. Niscaya allah‌ janena ebam tomara jana na.
